Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
grownup \grownup\ adj. fully developed; adult; mature; -- of people and animals; as, Act like a grownup!.
Syn: adult, big, full-grown, fully grown, grown. [WordNet 1.5]

grownup adj : (of animals) fully developed; "an adult animal"; "a grown woman" [syn: {adult}, {big}, {full-grown}, {fully grown}, {grown}] n : a fully developed person from maturity onward [syn: {adult}] [ant: {juvenile}]
